data.name: Xyz Crossing
data.detailed_description:
Monster collecting and battling AR mobile game, MeGiDo, takes the world by storm. However, two college students stumble upon the popular app's hidden functions -- including its potentially deadly PvP feature. Learning the game's occult origin, the students must face real supernatural threats with special jailbroken smartphones to preserve the world's balance.

KEY FEATURES

  • Dive into a Tight Story

    Experience an intense narrative. Uncover the hidden truth of a popular mobile game.

  • Explore Various Dungeons

    Navigate treacherous and monster-filled environments. Be well prepared with healing items and strong equipment.

  • Engage in Brisk Combat

    Exploit foes' weaknesses to survive encounters. Hitting physical weak point can lower an enemy's resistance to magical attacks and status effects!

  • Customize Skill Sets

    Equip and level up creatures gained from battles to unlock new abilities. Choose from over 100+ unique monsters!

WISHLIST NOW



Also checkout: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1675480

data.short_description: Dungeon crawler RPG. Fight powerful beings to uncover the dark secrets of a popular app.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
